name: Cardboard Colosseum
description:
**Due to issues with Web GL, we will not be building for it at this time. We thank you for taking the time to download our game and try it out!**

Recycle, Recycle, Recycle! We'll take all of your recyclables here at the Cardboard Colosseum!
We'll round 'em up, bound 'em up, then POUND 'em up!

That's right! Get your first row tickets to watch the best show around!
Watch as our champion attempts to survive as long as they can against waves of relentless foes and traps! 

Place your bets and enjoy the show!


This game was a submission to UDC Game Jam #15 with the theme: Death is not the end
Our game connects to the theme in the fact that your character is a spirit that inhabits 'vessels' to fight in the Colosseum. Your vessel breaks when hit enough though, so you'll need to inhabit a new one in order to keep fighting.

----The download version is highly recommended

----Stay tuned! We plan on post jam updates and release!
